subject: Reload no longer works
msgSnippet: Hi, Just joined the group so looking forward to seeing the sort of response I get! I have been using junit for a couple of months now and am mighty impressed.
messageBody:
Hi,

Just joined the group so looking forward to seeing the sort of response I
get!

I have been using junit for a couple of months now and am mighty impressed.
I have been running it from within JBuilder 5 and until now have had no
problems. I recently tried to get JBuilder 5 working with the new Java 1.4
beta2 (to no avail - but that's another problem) so switched all the
settings back to Java 1.3. However since I did this I now find that the
'reload classes before each run' on junit does not work!

Has anyone experienced a similar problem?
